Description: [Consult Codelist] The scheme that holds the unique identifiers used to identify the item being identified. Consult the codelists first to check the standard schemes recommended for this identifier.
The identifier for the Thing under the given scheme.
URI to identify the Thing under the given scheme.

The text-based description of the id, if provided by the scheme. In the case of a goods classification, this maybe the description of the code. In the case of an organzational identifier, this may be the legal name as recorded by the used registry.
